General.Name: B2Gold Corp
General.Description: B2Gold Corp. operates as a gold producer company in Canada. The company operates the Fekola Mine in Mali, the Masbate Mine in the Philippines, and the Otjikoto Mine in Namibia. It also owns 100% interest in the Gramalote gold project in Colombia. In addition, the company has a portfolio of other evaluation and exploration assets in Mali and Finland. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: Park Place, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2X8
